actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure with amendments. With written report No. 99-418.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 866.
Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

actions.text: Ordered to be Reported.
Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.  Report No: 99-971.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation.
Placed on Union Calendar No: 581.
House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Passed House by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 99-564.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation
Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation

official_title: A bill to amend an Act to add certain lands on the Island of Hawaii to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation or exchange the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, Hawaii. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend an Act to add certain lands on the Island of Hawaii to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, and for other purposes.
